hero.title: Systematize your
hero.subtitle: Transform complex prompt chains into repeatable, variable-driven workflows. Define logic with conditionals, manage context with variables, deploy precision prompts in milliseconds. 100% local. Markdown-native.

items.title: Same prompt, different results
items.description: Your team runs the same campaign brief through AI. Everyone gets different outputs because everyone forgets different details. Consistency becomes guesswork.

items.title: Your prompts are code—treat them that way
items.description: High-value prompt logic buried in chat histories and scattered notes. No version control. No structure. No way to iterate systematically.

items.title: Context drift kills quality
items.description: You remember a prompt worked brilliantly. But the exact variables, the specific constraints, the tone instructions—lost. Recreating magic shouldn't require archaeology.

steps.title: BYO knowledge base
steps.description: Point Incito at any folder. Your Obsidian vault. A git repo. A shared Dropbox. Your prompts stay as plain markdown files—zero lock-in, zero migration.

steps.title: Engineer your templates
steps.description: Define variables, dropdowns, conditionals. Build prompts that handle edge cases without rewriting. Logic lives in the template, not your memory.

steps.title: Execute with precision
steps.description: Your team fills in the variables. The template handles the complexity. Same inputs, same outputs. Every single time.

steps.title: Deploy anywhere
steps.description: One click copies your precision-engineered prompt. Paste into Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini—wherever your workflow takes you.

features.heading: Built for professionals who engineer results

items.title: Local-first. Zero telemetry.
items.description: Your IP never leaves your device until you paste it. No accounts. No cloud sync. Enterprise-ready privacy by default.

items.title: Native performance
items.description: Opens in milliseconds. Designed for flow state—no loading screens interrupting your momentum.

items.title: Conditional logic & variables
items.description: Use {{variables}}, {{#if}} blocks, and helpers. Your prompts become programmable. Handle complexity without complexity.

items.title: Zero lock-in architecture
items.description: Plain markdown files. Sync with git. Share via Dropbox. Your prompts are portable, versionable, yours.

items.title: AI-assisted generation*
items.description: Connect your preferred AI provider to help generate prompts. Or don't—the app works fully standalone. *It's 2026. Of course there's AI. You choose the provider, on your terms.

items.title: Keyboard-first
items.description: Navigate, search, and copy without leaving the keyboard. Designed for the ⌘-K generation.

items.title: Minimal by design
items.description: A focused interface that respects your attention. Light and dark modes. No clutter.

chromeExtension.heading: Chrome extension coming
chromeExtension.subheading: Access your prompt library directly in Claude, ChatGPT, and any AI interface. Same precision. Zero context switching.

cta.heading: Stop guessing. Start engineering.
cta.subheading: Transform your best prompts into repeatable systems. Free, open-source, and entirely yours.
